title: final project
content:
Hi  
i asked here few times in the past about  
city /arch’ typographic relation projects.

well its been done(few months ago), and i graduate from a design school  
and this is my final project.

its mostly visual, and the texts that are in hebrew are some  
article related(but they not the main issue.

the project is based on the relation between city and text  
on its visual and content,the way we read and scan textual information  
to the way we use the city,it got some levels of resulotion  
and in a line ill sum it:we read a content and live the content.  
its not the best presentation but its the general idea.

the final product is a 120 pages hardcover book that describe  
this textual journey|i called it “reading space,a textual journey in the city”  
if you find it intresting ive upload [a 20mb pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162011/http:/www.yousendit.com/transfer.php?action=download&ufid=379BD123006967E5) that contain all the book spreads.  
(it look better in the book)and it would be nice to hear opinions.

have fun

 [‹ Tween girlie font - - any suggestions?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162011/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27989 "Go to previous forum topic") [Setting Schopenhauer ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162011/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21481 "Go to next forum topic")
author: g_u_y_t

comments.content: I don’t know if it is my machine, or if it is art that I am not getting, but there are a lot of black boxes of different sizes on various pages. Are these fonts that are not coming through correctly on the pdf?
